description: A genius kid who became a scientist at age 12. he soon befriends one of nakki`s brain powerds and becomes its pilot later in the series. Kant is a gifted artest with a love of plants and is able to base most of his papers and theories on photosythesis. Due to his young age and intellect, he had a hard childhood without friends. Even though he is curious about organic energy, he has no desire to go to Orphan to learn.
name: Kant Kestner
